answers.answer: Clomid is known to dry up CM in some woman.  I think it might actually by as high as 25%.It is a lot to take it.  I've learned so much throughout all of this.  I had know idea there was so much to it all.  I took sex ed in school but honestly there was sooooooo much they never even covered.  who knew??Best of luck to you.

I was also on metformin. I started 1 pill daily then worked my way up the 3 pills daily. I continued on it until I achieved a pregnancy. Once I became pregnant I was followed by a endo during the pregnancy to follow my sugar levels. I ended up going on insulin. I needed the metformin in the beginning for the same reason you did. It did work for me. Hang in there!!!!
YES  night sweats is due from low estrogen it is the main side effect.

good to know it did work..... how long were you taking it before you got pg? just curious... i went for my hcg shot this morning... not as bad as i thought. I haven't had a shot in the butt since i was a kid and all i remembered was that i was terrified back then and it hurt...lol didn't hurt at all  did you also have to do hcg shots?

question: so i get a phone call from the nurse today to give me results on my blood work... (a little backgroud: they think i'm pcos, i've been on clomid for 2 cycles at 150mg, and i rarely ever get my period with out it being induced).... so she basically said that i have eggs but they are too small (anyone know what causes eggs to be small????)... i'm on cd21 and they are like 10mm, therefore don't even try bd'ing cuz it's not gonna happen so i have to go in for a hcg shot tomorrow to bring on my period.  I used provera for the last two months, it worked but they said instead of waiting out my cycle, taking provera for 10 days and then getting af.... get a shot and it will be here in 14 days or so.  Then she told me she saw high levels of insulin in my blood so they are sending it out to make sure i don't have diabetes... but that i will probably be put on metmorfin to reduce the amount of insulin in my system cause that could be a reason i'm not ovulating.  Along with the metamorfin, we're going to do injectables to make my eggs grow.... Does any one know how long you have to be on the metmorfin for?..... Last but not least, she said i have low estrogen... now, doesn't that make you have hot flashes? cuz i've been getting them real bad but i thought it was effects of the clomid... also does low estrogen make you "dry"? cuz bd'ing last night wasn't as pleasant as it should have been....wow, ok i feel like i wrote a book. I just got bombarded with all this info today and i know the only ones who could understand and answer these questions are you guys!  Thank God for this forum... at least reading everyone's experiences I dont' feel like i'm the only one and i've heard of all these terms and procedures! Thanks guys...just have to keep reminding ourselves that it will all be worth it in the end....
title: small eggs, metmorfiin, low estrogen, and hcg shot......JESUS!!
